short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add a touch of spooky charm with Hu Tao from Genshin Impact as your new tab companion! 🌸👻

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Step into the mystical world of Genshin Impact with Hu Tao, the quirky and spirited director of the Wangsheng Funeral Parlor. Known for her playful yet mysterious demeanor, Hu Tao brings her ghostly charm to your Chrome experience. Let her signature pyro abilities and vibrant personality set your screen ablaze with every new tab you open!

Key Features
🔥 Animated Hu Tao Visuals: Enjoy lively animations featuring Hu Tao’s pyro powers and ghostly companions.
🔍 Google Search Bar: Effortlessly search the web with Hu Tao keeping you company.
🕒 Clock & Date Display: Stay organized while surrounded by Hu Tao’s eerie yet cheerful energy.
📂 Customizable Shortcuts: Add or remove shortcuts to personalize your browsing experience.
🔗 Manage Extensions: Easily access "Remove Extension" and "More Extensions" links from the bottom-left corner.
Embrace Hu Tao’s playful spirit and make every tab a fiery adventure! Perfect for Genshin Impact fans who love her lively charm and enigmatic aura.

For more extensions: https://gameograf.com/
